amendment.description: Amendment establishes a bright-line standard of majority stock ownership for determining whether a venture capital company is affiliated with the companies in which it invests.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-350 to establish a bright line standard of majority stock ownership for determining whether a venture capital company is affiliated with the companies in which it invests.
